amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the total amount of Multilateral Assistance funding in the bill by $505,896,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 111-193 to reduce the total amount of Title V funding in the bill, Multilateral Assistance, by $505,896,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 256 (Roll no. 520).
